name: query
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool netdetective.
Tool description: NetDetective is an easy-to-use API that provides information about an IP address, including, but not limited to, whether it's known for spam, brute-force attacks, bot-nets, VPN endpoints, data center endpoints, and more. With DetectiveIP, you can quickly and easily gather information about any IP address to help filter requests and avoid potential attacks.
API description: Queries information about an IP address using the NetDetective API.

ipaddress.description: The IP address to use for the query. Defaults to None, which uses the IP address of the connecting client.
